Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This property contains the available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PCIeLinks.description: Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.
PCIeLinks.longDescription: This type, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

PCIeDevice.description: An array of references to the PCIe Devices contained in this slot.
PCIeDevice.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of references to the resources that this physical slot is associated with and shall reference resources of type PCIeDevice. If the Status.State of this slot has a value of Absent, this property shall not appear in the resource.

PCIeSlot.description: This is the definition for a PCI slot information object.
PCIeSlot.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for a PCIe Slot for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Lanes.description: This is the number of PCIe lanes supported by this slot.
Lanes.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the maximum number of PCIe lanes supported by the slot.

Links.description: Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This type, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.

Location.description: The Location of the PCIe slot.
Location.longDescription: This property shall contain part location information, including a ServiceLable of the associated PCIe Slot.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

PCIeType.description: This is the PCIe specification supported by this slot.
PCIeType.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the maximum PCIe specification that this slot supports.

SlotType.description: This is the PCIe slot type for this slot.
SlotType.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the slot type as specified by the PCIe specification.

Status.description: This property describes the status and health of the resource and its children.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

PCIeSlots.description: This is the schema definition for the PCIe Slot properties.
PCIeSlots.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent an set of PCIe slot  information for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

Slots.description: An array of PCI Slot information.
Slots.longDescription: This array shall contain an entry for each PCIe slot, including empty slots (with no device or card installed).

title: #PCIeSlots.v1_0_0.PCIeSlots
